main event: A red blinking light, the size of a pea, was sighted visually and on radar 10 miles south of Cape Makkovik.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 10-15 seconds., The object was identified as possibly being a helicopter., The light was observed both visually and on radar., The radar indicated a southbound movement around an iceberg., The conditions were clear with a visibility of 15 miles.
location: Cape Makkovik, Newfoundland and Labrador, CA
witness description: A/2C members from the 933RD ACGW Operational and Maintenance team.
